title: Ukrainian military had 52 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Bohdanivka, Klischiyivka...
content: Ukrainian military had 52 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Bohdanivka, Klischiyivka, Andriyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, south to Umanske, Pervomayske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka and Urozhayne of Donetsk region, Robotyne of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
